candidate.name: Henry R. Bolden III
candidate.tagline: Recruiting Operations Lead | Process Optimization | Systems Integration

summary: Recruiting Operations Leader with 10+ years optimizing global hiring systems, managing coordination teams, and driving operational excellence across high-growth and enterprise organizations. Deep hands-on expertise in ATS administration (Greenhouse, Workday), interview scheduling optimization, compliance management, and analytics infrastructure. Proven ability to scale recruiting operations while maintaining data integrity, process rigor, and an exceptional candidate experience. Track record includes 3x recruiter productivity gains, 30% reduction in time-to-offer, and $1M in operational savings.

Overhauled interview scheduling workflows, introducing structured calendar templates and same-day turnaround SLAs. Reduced coordinator workload by 40% and scheduling errors by 25%.
